channel.title: Calling static varaibles to another class
channel.description:
I'm having trouble calling absX and abxY in another class. Says I cant use static variables or something. Any pointers would be greatly appreciated.
Doesn't anyone know how I would call static variables to another class?

item.title: Calling static varaibles to another class
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

thats what i thought but he said they were static…

Read full topic
item.source: Calling static varaibles to another class

item.title: Calling static varaibles to another class
item.dc:creator: @haxerownsmopar haxerownsmopar
item.description:
@haxerownsmopar wrote:

absx and absy are player variables and shouldnt be static in most servers

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Calling static varaibles to another class
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

[quote=“zuppers, post:1, topic:158165”]I’m having trouble calling absX and abxY in another class. Says I cant use static variables or something. Any pointers would be greatly appreciated.

Doesn’t anyone know how I would call static variables to another class?[/quote]

you cant, you have to add those variables into the class that you are using
